DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetics 4 % Lidocaine Gel When Applied Topically Breasts
DOC.criteria: 35 year old intact skin breast chest wall sensitivity allergy lidocaine liver kidney dysfunction pregnant breast feed currently smoke chew tobacco use lidocaine product within 48 hour baseline lab , EKG , gel application exhibit neurological cardiac sign symptom prior gel application take antiarrythmic medication , ciprofloxacin , erythromycin product , oral contraceptive history WolffeParkinsonWhite Syndrome ( WPW ) congestive heart failure heart rate 60 100 beat per minute systolic blood pressure 95 180 mm Hg PR interval great 200 msec , QRS duration great 120 msec , QTc great 450 msec , evidence WPW EKG automatic implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( AICD ) cardiac pacemaker cancer , surgery , trauma , myocardial infarction past 6 month
